nodes.bodyText: Should we take the time here and make this pattern consistent with the rest of the samples? I.e. put the part where we add the MapView to the StackPane at the very end of the start method?
If you decide to move the stackPane interaction I mentioned above, then we could move the creation of the map view down to here, so it looks the same as with the other samples`
Thanks I've tidied this ordering up

I know you haven't touched this code, but might be worth updating this?
I think it makes more sense to set the SR on the map, rather than on an individual point, and then not specify a SR when creating points/viewpoints and adding them to our map.
Then we ould also get rid of the initialLocation and create the Viewpoint directly with the coordinates.
Thanks Jon your comments have helped me untangle that. Have done some tweaks and tested.
Nice work, it looks so much nicer 🚀

Maybe we should split this up (like in most samples), or rephrase the comment so that it's more accurate about what the code does?
// create a map and add it to a new map view would make more sense, beause the map view doesn't exist until we create it in this block
another query about the conversion of level of detail 2 to scale 40000 here (see original comment here https://github.com/Esri/arcgis-runtime-samples-java/pull/602/files#r538755384)
as above: different scale, let's try and be consistent if possible
was there a reason this scale changed to 9000000 when the original scale was set to 6000000?
